modifiers.information-society: appreciates being born into the information society
modifiers.immerse: who's been immersed most of the time

About.title: About
About.p1: Used to enjoy computer science fields like reading [Standard of C Language] since highschool, but I started to consider CS developer as a job at the college. The start was just for fun. but when I typed the linux prompt at '42 Seoul', I felt alive and realized that I had just found lifetime work which is worth putting my everything into.
About.p2: Usually spend my time on Coding, but playing piano sometimes. Often read books about philosophy, International Politics, and Futurology. Interested in understanding aspects of the information society.
